name: root.cz - reklamni lista bez obrazku
obsoletion_message:
Broken images - 2014/11/04
"Broken images" <- yes, it's precisely what it is supposed to do.
"reklamni lista bez obrazku" means "ad bar without pictures"
additional_info: Do NOT delete this b/c "broken pictures", it's exactly what it is supposed to do - hide pictures in an ad bar.
